name: "Safe" Spoken Word Poem
description:
This NFT comes with a downloadable file of Spearit Bear's spoken word poem: "Safe" Purchase of this NFT transfers ownership of the digital file and image, not the right to ownership of the audio itself. Commercial use of the image or the audio file, aside from the resale of this NFT, must be requested and approved by Spearit Bear beforehand. This poem was first released on streaming platforms in 2021 but is now exclusively available here.
This spoken word poem was written by Spearit Bear shortly after the murder of George Floyd. May he rest in peace.
This audio NFT qualifies as one that can be collected to add to the 3 needed to be considered a ‘Promoter’ to receive referral bonuses from primary sales, and the 5 total needed for a collector to be considered a 'Distributor' and receive monthly Distributor pool payments from secondary sale royalties. More info on other perks at spearitbear.com/nfts
